refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the loop segment start-time of a stored function table number.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the loop segment start-time of a stored function table number.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Returns the loop segment start-time (in seconds) of stored function table number x. This reports the duration of the direct recorded attack and decay parts of a sound sample, prior to its looped segment. Returns zero (and a warning message) if the sample does not contain loop points.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
